attributes.action: subsidise the payment for nurses to register with the NMC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is mandatory for nurses to register with the Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC), otherwise they are not allowed to practice as qaulified nurses. the annual ammount has become ridiculous. why are nurses made to pay so that they are allowed to work? nurses are leaving the profession in droves and this does not help.
